name: Love
wishText: Always remember that I'm always here for you, mi amor. ;)
textInChatBox: Happy 18th birthday to you!! Yeeey legal age na sya! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.

outroText: Okay, now chat me if you liked it.
